title: Emacs mode: erroneous indent if type contains the word "Interface"
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

type foo struct {
<tab>iface *Interface
<tab><tab>after enter next line starts here
}

vs

type foo struct {
<tab>iface *Interfacex
<tab>after enter next line starts here
}

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

weekly.2011-09-07

Please provide any additional information below.

GNU Emacs 23.1.50.1 (i386-mingw-nt6.1.7601)
